featured.name: Standard Communities
featured.tagline: AI-powered data intelligence for affordable housing.
featured.description: Built AI agents and MCP servers that unify data from HUD and disparate sources, enhance it with LLMs and high-quality geocoding, confidence-score across subjective data, and power multi-million dollar deal-making decisions in the affordable housing space.
features: Custom AI agents and MCP servers for data unification
Multi-source data ingestion (HUD, public records, proprietary)
LLM-powered data enhancement and entity resolution
Real-time decision support for multi-million dollar deals
Rapid iteration with direct end-user feedback loops

featured.name: PathQuest
featured.tagline: Track your summits. Discover new peaks. Conquer challenges.
featured.description: A full-stack web and mobile platform for mountain peak baggers, built in ~6 weeks using AI-powered development. Integrates with Strava, features interactive Mapbox visualizations, and transforms athlete activity data into insights.

other.name: AI Endurance
other.description: Ground-up redesign of a legacy endurance training platform. Translated customer feedback into high-impact features that directly improved usability and engagement.
highlights: Hundreds of thousands of monthly page views

other.name: 33Floors
other.description: Team lead for customer-facing software development. Built high-performance Python ETL pipelines processing hundreds of GBs of real estate data. Partnered with CTO/CEO to translate business needs into features.
highlights: Python ETL pipelines: 100s of GB in <30 min

other.name: Portfolio Sites
other.description: Bringing creative vision to life for artists, entrepreneurs, and makers. I craft bespoke portfolio sites that don't just showcase work—they tell stories. Bold aesthetics, buttery animations, and pixel-perfect attention to detail that makes people stop scrolling.
highlights: Custom designs tailored to each creative's brand
